name: NU Admission - Smart Admission System
desc: A Django-based student admission system for NU Lipa, allowing student registration, admin management, and future ML integration for processing applications.

name: AI Caimito Fruit Classification Using Deep Learning
desc: Developed an image-based Caimito fruit classification model using deep learning to distinguish Caimito fruits from non-Caimito objects.

name: Coffea Liberica Farm Geo-Mapping System
desc: A web-based system for mapping and managing Coffea Liberica farms in batangas.
